Marseel appears in the photo with his new laptop.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Jameel

texts.en:
Jameel is a 29-years-old married man from Khanyounis. He lives with his wife and four young daughters in a very simple house. 

Jameel is an employee of the public sector and earns a low income.  This income barley meets the family's needs. He is also a student in a local university and is working on a masters degree in business adminstration . He would like to use the masters degree to find a better job in the future. 

Jameel took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN to buy a new laptop for his university studies. Jameel will be able to do his home work and write the reports more easily. 

Jameel appears in the photo with is new laptop.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his university studies.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora JUANA  de 56  años de edad es soltera, tiene  01 hijo  que depende de ella,  radica en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 07 años  al negocio de venta de golosinas como tacos, enchiladas, frescos natural, choco bananos, charamuscas, granos básicos, etc. Sus clientes les prefieren por su amabilidad y buen trato, ella es una mujer que ha luchado sola  durante mucho tiempo y gracias a su esfuerzo ha podido salir adelante y  es una buena cliente ejemplo de honestidad y trabajo.
Doña Juana está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra frescos de botella, frutas, mínimos,  azúcar y medicamentos, con el apoyo de este crédito ella pretende mejorar sus finanzas y su salud ya que con los apoyos de los préstamos ella compra los medicamentos que necesita para su salud.
Doña Juna su sueño es mejorar  su salud y mejorar su casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2014
texts.en:
Señora Juana, age 56, is single.  She has one dependent child.  She has her own house and lives in the San Lorenzo community in southern Honduras.  

She has worked for seven years selling snacks such as tacos, enchiladas, natural drinks, chocobananas, frozen fruit twists, basic staples, etc.  Her customers prefer her thanks to her friendliness and good service.  She is a woman who has fought on her own for a long time and, thanks to her effort, has managed to get ahead.  

She is a good customer—an example of honesty and hard work.  Doña Juana is asking for this loan to buy bottled drinks, fruit, bananas, sugar, and medicines.  With the help of this loan she plans to improve her finances and her health, because with the support of the loan she will buy the medicine that she needs for her health.

Doña Juana’s dream is to improve her health and her home.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2014

loans.use: to buy bottled drinks, fruit, bananas, sugar, and medicine for her health and business.

loans.name: Ruksana

texts.en:
Ruksana is a 35-year-old married woman. To meet the needs of the family members, she started selling material a year ago. She purchases a variety of material from the whole sale market and then sells them locally. She has a varied customer base and her business earns enough money. 

She requests 45,000 PKR from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of material in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Qadiran

texts.en:
Qadiran is a 45-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of hand-embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested for a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment. In this way she would be able to cater for more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She is in her 5th loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Deo

texts.en:
Deo, a 45-year-old married man with three children has been in the business of selling firewood since 2004 at Kitumba Binanata, a suburb in Fort Portal, Uganda. He started this business in order to earn a living but low capital and high transportation costs are still hindering the business. 

Deo wishes to have all his children educated up to University level. Deo is asking for a loan to buy more firewood to sell.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is a 43-year old married lady with 4 children, 2 attend school.

She grows maize and rice on a large scale in the Kabarole district of Rwimi.  Anna also trades these grains and stores them for  resale when prices are high. She says that bad weather affects her business.  Anna wants a loan to buy rice to sell.

Her wish is to see her children educated.

loans.use: to buy rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to care for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 28-year-old single man from Khanyounis City. He lives alone in a small house. Ahmad works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a very low income. He would like to improve his living conditions. He decided to work also in selling fruits and vegetables in the local market. He buys them from the local farmers. 

Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more fruits and vegetables for his business to resell. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to increase his sales and also his income. 

Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables for his business to resell.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 41 year old resident of Fort Portal.  He has 6 children and all of them are school going age. He has grown  food for 2 years to support his family. Moses says bad weather, theft, and poor roads affect the business and he wishes to buy land for personal development. 

Moses is asking for a loan to buy Irish potatoes to plant.

loans.use: to buy Irish portatoes to plant.

loans.name: Bakhat

texts.en:
Bakhat is a 40-year-old married woman. She and her husband have sold milk for many years. She has two buffalo to produce milk to sell to the local people. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra profit. 

Bakhat has become famous for providing good-quality milk and earns enough money to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. She is in her 8th loan cycle and has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR. This will allow her to purchase anoather buffalo. 

Bakhat is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Purev-Erdene

texts.en:
Purev-Erdene is 34 years old. She lives with her husband and 3 children in their small house in Arkhangai province, Mongolia. Her husband, Amarjargal, helps his wife to run her tailoring service business. Her 3 children are all age 11 and attend local schools.
 
Purev-Erdene started her tailoring service business in a rental place and is now providing quality traditional and modern clothing by order. Her clients are happy with her good service and with her well-designed and well-fitting clothes. She is a hard-working, talented and welcoming lady. She is now requesting a loan of 1,800,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of inventory to produce more products to increase her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of inventory to produce more products

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 27-year-old, married man from Khanyounis city. He lives with his wife and two children; a son and a daughter is a small house. Mohammad works in selling fruits and vegetables in the local market, which he buys from the local farmers. Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more fruits and vegetables for his business to resell. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to increase his sales and also his income.  Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables for his business to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a large, seasonal clothing inventory to sell.
